moves.2. Qe2 dxe4 3. Qxe4 Nf6 4. Qf3 Nc6 5. Nc: A poor move my Knight has a good square on d4 now.
moves.6... Bf5: I get my bishop out with a tempo and the pawn on c2 is dead
moves.7. Qe3: The worst move of the game(so far!)
moves.9... e5 10. Bb5+ c6: The only piece stopping me from checkmating on the d3 square with my queen is his bishop...

gameName: Watch me slaughter this guy!(Comic value only)
